topic.title: Example Configuration with Bonds and vLANs
topic.shortdesc: The following configuration will configure five (5) vLANs across two bonds:

ul.li: The first bond uses eth1, eth4, and eth5 for vLANs 141, 151, and 170
The second bond uses eth0 and eth3 for vLANs 140 and 150

body.p: Both bonds are configured for 802.3ad bonding mode. Each vLAN is assigned an IP address on its respective network.
body.note: eth2 is not bonded, and is used for provisioning.
